welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Guadalupe, Colombia! Get ready to be charmed by our vibrant culture, delicious cuisine, and breathtaking landscapes. We invite you to explore and savor all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

restaurants.name: Xico's Café
restaurants.description: Xico's Café is a café located in São Tomé.
restaurants.address: Praça da Amizade Entre os Povos, 392, São Tomé

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pitalito Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Pitalito Airport handles the transportation of goods and packages.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free wifi throughout the airport.
